channel.title: D4rkScape Preview (BEST 317 SERVER EVER!)
channel.description:
[b]D4rkScape[/b]
D4rkscape is the best 317 server ever!
If enough people like it I will release it.
[u]What does this server have?[/u] 100% castle wars 95% dueling (adding rest of the rules) 100% fight pits 100% quests (no broken quest they all work) 100% skills (all skills work) 100% clan chat working 100% player reporting (mods will see who is getting reported and why, also who reported them) full npcs around the whole map adding skill cape emotes over 50 shops!!! syi proof so no spammers get on. has over 30 custom items (dplate, dclaws, etc...) all specials work full pking (1v1 in edge and multi everywhere else) has real kbd has real kq has all skill capes added full fishing slayer and farming both work! everywhere on the map you will find npcs!
[u]Magic[/u] Full modern magic Full ancient magic Full lunars magic
Pictures!!!!
[img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/D4rkscape2pic.png[/img] [img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/Screenshot0000.png[/img] [img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/Screenshot0001.png[/img] [img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/Screenshot0002.png[/img] [img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/Screenshot0003.png[/img] [img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/Screenshot0000-1.png[/img] [img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/Screenshot0008.png[/img] [img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/D4rkscapeRapes.jpg[/img] [img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/pknewserver.png[/img] [img]http://i365.photobucket.com/albums/oo100/d4rkscape/dueling.png[/img]
If you would like to help test it out let me know. More comming soon!!!

D4rkScape

D4rkscape is the best 317 server ever!

If enough people like it I will release it.

What does this server have?
100% castle wars
95% dueling (adding rest of the rules)

slayer and farming both work!
